trans-unit.source: Enables optimized strings to be managed in a dynamic way.
trans-unit.target: 啟用以動態方式來管理最佳化的字串。

trans-unit.source: Session objects (this class together with <xref:System.Xml.XmlBinaryWriterSession>) enable dynamic string atomization that can span an entire conversation.
trans-unit.target: 工作階段物件 (這個類別加上 <xref:System.Xml.XmlBinaryWriterSession>) 會啟用可以在整個對話期間套用的動態字串散切 (Atomization)。

trans-unit.source: These session objects manage dynamic dictionaries of <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString> instances.
trans-unit.target: 這些工作階段物件會管理 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString> 執行個體的動態字典。

trans-unit.source: For more information about dynamic dictionaries see <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 如需動態字典的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: Due to asynchronous processing, it is possible for messages that arrive synchronously to be processed in a different order than they order in which they were sent.
trans-unit.target: 由於是在非同步處理的情況下，因此可能會以不同於訊息傳送的順序來處理同步抵達的訊息。

trans-unit.source: String atomization that spans messages must ensure the messages are processed in the original order, or the atomized strings must be conveyed using a different mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 必須是使用不同的機制來傳達字串不可部分完成範圍的訊息，必須確定在原始的順序或原子化的字串來處理訊息。

trans-unit.source: To use them you create a session object and pass it to the constructor or initializer for a binary XML reader or writer.
trans-unit.target: 為了使用這些字串，您要建立工作階段物件，再將它傳遞給二進位 XML 讀取器或寫入器的建構函式或初始設定式。

trans-unit.source: To reuse a dynamic dictionary simply pass the same session object to all subsequent readers and/or writers.
trans-unit.target: 若要重複使用動態字典，只要直接將同一個工作階段物件傳遞給所有後續的讀取器和 (或) 寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlBinaryReaderSession" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlBinaryReaderSession" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The key value.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵值。

trans-unit.source: The value.
trans-unit.target: 數值。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" /> from the input parameters and adds it to an internal collection.
trans-unit.target: 從輸入參數建立 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" />，並將它加入至內部集合。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" /> that is added to an internal collection.
trans-unit.target: 加入內部集合的新建 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="id" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An entry with key = <paramref name="id" /> already exists.
trans-unit.target: 具有索引鍵 = <paramref name="id" /> 的項目已存在。

trans-unit.source: Clears the internal collection of all contents.
trans-unit.target: 清除所有內容的內部集合。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the internal collection contains an entry.
trans-unit.target: 檢查內部集合是否包含項目。

trans-unit.source: The key to search on.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a string if an entry is found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，如果找到項目，則包含字串，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the internal collection contains an entry matching a key.
trans-unit.target: 檢查內部集合是否包含符合索引鍵的項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an entry matching the <paramref name="key" /> was found; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到符合 <paramref name="key" /> 的項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的值。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a string if an entry is found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，如果找到項目，則包含字串，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the internal collection contains an entry matching a value.
trans-unit.target: 檢查內部集合是否包含符合某個值的項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an entry matching the <paramref name="value" /> was found; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到符合 <paramref name="value" /> 的項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的值。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a string if an entry is found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，如果找到項目，則包含字串，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the internal collection contains an entry matching a value.
trans-unit.target: 檢查內部集合是否包含符合某個值的項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an entry matching the <paramref name="value" /> was found; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到符合 <paramref name="value" /> 的項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
